title: Sidewall With Border, 1780–1800
creditline: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
description: Design honoring General Nathaniel Greene, spelled Green in the design. A medallion of Gen'l Greene alternates with medallion with 2 people in battle, one having wings, possibly Mars and Fame. Printed in grisaille on gray ground. There is evidence of pink in the border, and possibly in the sidewall paper.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall With Border, 1780–1800.
1780–1800. Block-printed on handmade paper. Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology. 1998-75-86-a,b.
